Html:
I put a wide Chart control inside a ScrollViewer, in order to make the chart scrollable.

MSDN documentation says: "A ScrollViewer enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size". However, this is not the case here. Maybe it's because my language demands FlowDirection="RightToLeft", but I tested other possibilities, and the chart is always cut off, either to the right side or to the left.

What goes wrong here?
